description: Try our easy to follow Rocky Road Wreath recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rocky road,Nov 2019,High fibre,Seafood free,Low salt,Christmas,Chocolate,Quick & easy dessert
name: Rocky Road Wreath Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup marshmallows, plus extra to decorate
0.5 cup walnuts, plus extra to decorate
0.25 cup dried cranberries, plus extra to decorate

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 23cm bundt or ring tin with oil. Combine dark chocolate, marshmallow, walnuts, cranberries and shortbread in a medium bowl. Transfer to tin and smooth top. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or until completely set.
Remove from fridge and firmly tap tin on a chopping board until chocolate releases. Drizzle over white chocolate and top with extra marshmallows, walnuts and cranberries. Decorate with ribbon.
